Name: Four-color Fantasy
About the game: GUIDE It’s a Tile-matching video game. The attractive photos are covered by blocks which are locked by magic ball with four colors. The magic ball list show the combinations available to unlock the block. Align 3 balls which of same color and same star-level in a row to get a higher star-level ball of the same color. ABOUT THIS GAME Four-Color Fantasy is an indie X-rated Game. The arts and music clip are unoriginal. The game including 30 levels, 60 achievements. Playable and enjoyable. Surprise code: sonlovesthis
